title: Pattaya
author: Pattaya
content: I want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.Peoples give you better suggestion to go for youtube concerning your matter because there you will learn step by step task which is easily understandable for new usersThis is official tutorial of Binance for new users and I think it will be helpful.https://youtu.be/23z1xlD-9YY?feature=sharedFor quick and easy verification of KYC, just use your smartphone, download Binance app, login there and then go to KYC verification page, just put all necessary information, upload front and back of ID Card, complete live face verification and your are done. normally verification completed in 24 hours.

comments.author: LSDadventure
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.If you want to verify your Binance account, you have to do it on Binance.How to verify your Binance account?No better place to find guides for it than Binance, Identity Verification that has many guides and videos to for you to go step-by-step for identity verification on Binance.I don't know how you thought you can verify your Binance account through Youtube or Google?

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.There are information that one would be skeptical about but in this case Binance itself has educative articles and videos that show those that are new to the site how to properly navigate around and you have been provided with a link by @gladitorcomeback to Binance YouTube channel on the subject matter, which means you should have been able to complete it yourself if you had obey the previous advice you got about using google search and YouTube. And you might even be surprised that some users might even encourage you to use a non-kyc exchange if you care about your privacy after giving you the steps you need in completing the verification.

comments.author: cryptoWODL
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.Getting Binance account verified is now much easier and even faster I tell you.I hope you have created your account.Regardless of the country you are a citizen of, if you have your own identity card, passport, then you can easily verify your account.I am explaining you very simply and generally through some pictures.You can verify your account with any document marked red in this picture.But if you want to verify your account quickly, then you will see (1) number written in the red marked circle. After clicking there, you can verify the account with your own ID number.After clicking on the red circle with number one, you can see a page like this, there is your ID card number. (ID card number of whose ID card you want to verify)Name and father's name and date of birth should be given.After giving them correctly, a page will appear in front of you where you will be asked to take a picture of your face, move your head according to their instructions, close and open your eyes, tilt your head up and down.If these are correct your account will be verified within few minutes.

comments.author: Velemir Sava
comments.body: I think there's no need for much detail because every time we register, the terms and conditions of the exchange we register for already exist and we just have to follow the process and it's not just Binance, others are like that too. One thing you need to know is that you have to go through the KYC process so that you can do WD later.  .

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Register on Binance first like a normal social media account and input your details preferably the one they asked for since its a centralized exchange theyll be needing some proof of identity. So if you are a student might not feasible or ask your parents to do it for you. Being verified is easy once you submitted all information needed.

comments.author: freedomgo
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.I don't think this even deserve a thread, you can just simply search on google on how to do it. It's not complicated if you will carefully follow the procedures, since Binance is a regulated exchange, the KYC requirement is the basic requirement and you have to sumbit the necessary documents which is your ID.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.Do you mean to complete the identity verification stage, or what verify are you talking about?Do not try to do anything outside of Binance, such as sending your doc to someone who might help you with that. It is better to ask the support team instead of searching on Google or YouTube.If you can stay away from any exchange that requires identity verification, that is better.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Unfortunately I haven't verify my Binance account and never ever because Why KYC is extremely dangerous – and useless.I guess asking through their live support is faster than asking through this forum, @OP you need to use your common sense.My advice is stay away against centralized exchange.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: What step are you having problems with specifically? Binance account verification is very straightforward and they have instructions for every step anyway that even my non-savvy parents can follow the instructions easily.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on November 17, 2023, 05:31:07 AMWhat step are you having problems with specifically? Binance account verification is very straightforward and they have instructions for every step anyway that even my non-savvy parents can follow the instructions easily.That is true, so I don't know what advice he wants from "experienced and senior brothers in this forum" Is he/she looking for a method to bypass KYC fast, maybe through identity fraud? I don't think that this is the philosophy of most members of the forum (or maybe I'm not so senior, but I don't think that is the problem).So who knows, maybe he/she was simply asking how to verify identity, that can be done without coming to a specialized forum, or maybe someone understands what he really means and contact him/her in private.OP, if your intentions are good, beware of possible scam attempts in your inbox. If they're not, consider getting back on the right track before it's too late.

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.You can't pass verification on Binance exchange searching Youtube and Google, what are they look for? Fake ID and addresses? It's not going to work on Binance exchange because they use live verification where they won't allow you to upload any picture, you will need to hold your ID you just submitted in your hand and take selfie, some will even ask you to right your name and date on paper and hold it with your ID card, gone are the days where you can use a fake ID to pass KYC verification. The last time I passed KYC verification on Binance was so easily done, all I dropped was my BVN number and they automatically have access to my full name and others, no ID dropped and no selfie was asked of me, but right now I am not sure that they still have that available, you can check if it is, but it's the most easiest way of completing KYC verification on Binance exchange, the easiest I have ever done on any exchange so far. KYC verification is not complicated to pass, there is no need to go online looking for videos to watch, just follow Binance rules and regulations, they will guide you through easily.After clicking your account details you will see identification on the menu like this..Then you will see verification levels and if you haven't passed any before you should start with the Fiat limit of 50k USD daily as this is what I passed too.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.By following the steps during verification, you should not have major complications if you do everything correctly. If you need help with relatively simple things like this, maybe you should think about whether Binance is for you, because later you will encounter perhaps more complicated things that can cost you money.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.I don't know what you mean. Even when I don't understand something, I can watch certain tutorial videos on YouTube which will help me.completing KYC verification is not a matter of experience or not. it just requires you to follow the procedure. As long as you can follow, you will verify your account smoothly.Maybe it will be different if the problem is related to a problematic document or the quality of the photo you sent is poor. but if you don't have any problem with your documents, just follow the procedure, then you will be done.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on November 17, 2023, 12:50:11 PMQuote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.I want your advice.By following the steps during verification, you should not have major complications if you do everything correctly. If you need help with relatively simple things like this, maybe you should think about whether Binance is for you, because later you will encounter perhaps more complicated things that can cost you money.This is just like simply telling OP that the binance exchange he is about to get his identity verified on is not the best for him and shouldn’t be so comfortable keeping his funds there. I hope things don’t get more complicated for him and he must have known the disadvantages of keeping money in a centralized exchange. Getting verified and using the exchange should just be for the exchange of his coins to fiat or buying bitcoin and shouldn’t be for trading or storing his money there.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.Why are you not interested in learning from YouTube, isn't it easy to comprehend with or what, i think that should even be the best way because you're going to be seing it from step to step on how it's been done, if you're going to accept the contributions that may be coming from any experienced bitcointalk community members, they may even discourage you from using a centralized exchange because here we don't advise much on what will render your bitcoin at risk, not your keys not your coins, you will be advised to go a decentralized exchange or cold storage, but here, your reasons for choosing Binance are best known to you at your own risk.

comments.author: lumbanrang
comments.body: Quote from: LSDadventure on November 17, 2023, 02:16:57 AMQuote from: Pattaya on November 17, 2023, 01:55:59 AMI want to verify my exchange account.Many people will say that you can verify by searching YouTube or Google but I am not interested in that.I want to learn from our experienced and senior brothers in this forum and know how to get my Binance account verified easily and quickly.If you want to verify your Binance account, you have to do it on Binance.How to verify your Binance account?No better place to find guides for it than Binance, Identity Verification that has many guides and videos to for you to go step-by-step for identity verification on Binance.I don't know how you thought you can verify your Binance account through Youtube or Google?getting a verified Binance account is not difficult, you only need to prepare a good internet network and your original personal data because as long as you include your original and actual personal data then you will have no difficulty getting your Binance account verified, just 1 month ago I succeeded to create a verified Binance account and the process takes less than 24 hours, you have to be able to prove it yourself that it is not difficult to create a verified Binance account.

comments.author: Litzki1990
comments.body: First, download the Binance app on your device from the App Store or Play Store, after downloading, sign up to this exchange with your Gmail account. After completing the signup you have to login your account and after login go to the verification option and go to the next step with the specific information of your nid card or driving license or passport. In the next step of verification you may be asked to scan your face, after scanning your face you have to submit the verification. You will be emailed from Binance shortly after submitting the verification. If the information is correct and you can provide all the information correctly then your account verification will be completed. You will find this related information more easily in you tube videos. You can verify your account by watching any video of your choice if you search on YouTube.

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: Quote from: Litzki1990 on November 17, 2023, 03:02:53 PMFirst, download the Binance app on your device from the App Store or Play StoreThe bottom line is never searching for an application in App Store or Play Store (Google Play). If you want to find a link for download, get it at an official website. Scroll up and down, usually you will see the link at middle or bottom of an exchange's landing page. Click on it to download an application.Searching through Apple Store or Google Play can cost you if you find a fake app and use it. Quoteafter downloading, sign up to this exchange with your Gmail account.Not all people use Gmail for registration an account on Binance.
